name: Dark Wigglytuff
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: This Pokémon has soft, fine hair. When angered, it increases in size and has been known to charge those it considers a threat.

attacks.name: Dark Song
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Slap Awake
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep or Confused, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. Then, the Defending Pokémon is no longer Asleep or Confused.
